main event: A very bright unidentified object was observed over the Gulf of Aden on November 28, 1961.
interesting points: The object was observed to rise with a white lightning appearance., The object was on a course of 140Â° and later appeared to hesitate overhead., The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes., The observer believed it to be an optical illusion due to atmospheric turbulence., The object was initially sighted bearing 328 true and lost from sight at bearing 143 true.
